images.gemini_prompt:
Create a professional Open Graph social media image (1200x630px content area, placed in 1400x900px canvas with 100px padding). Design style: Modern minimal tech/SaaS aesthetic.

Layout:
- Background: Clean white (#ffffff)
- Top-left: Small "BITSAAC" wordmark in neutral-950 (#0a0a0a)
- Left third: Large bold headline "How It Works" in neutral-950, below it "4-Phase Structure" in neutral-600
- Right two-thirds: Visual diagram showing 4 connected phases horizontally:
  * Phase boxes: Rounded rectangles with subtle shadows
  * Phase 0: "Screening" - small box in neutral-100 (#f5f5f5)
  * Phase 1: "Foundation" - medium box with blue-50 (#eff6ff) background
  * Phase 2: "Contribution" - larger box with blue-100 background
  * Phase 3: "Specialization" - medium box with green-50 (#f0fdf4) background
  * Connecting arrows between phases (simple arrows in neutral-300)
- Each phase box has: Phase number at top, phase name in bold below
- Bottom: "3-6 months total" in small text, neutral-700

Style: Clean, diagram-like, educational but professional, clear visual hierarchy.

leonardo_prompt.positive_prompt: Professional infographic banner, modern minimal design, white background, bold headline "How It Works", 4-phase diagram with connected boxes, rounded rectangles, subtle gradients from light gray to light blue to light green, simple arrows connecting phases, labels "Screening Foundation Contribution Specialization", clean typography, SaaS design aesthetic, educational infographic style, geometric shapes, professional layout, 1200x630 aspect ratio in 1400x900 canvas
leonardo_prompt.negative_prompt: cluttered, complex diagram, too many colors, photographs, people, decorative elements, stock imagery, cartoonish, childish, low quality, blurry

images.design_notes: Focus on the visual progression through phases. Use subtle color coding (neutral → blue → blue → green) to show advancement. Keep it clean and easy to understand at a glance.

for_gemini: Always specify the canvas is 1400x900px with the actual design centered in 1200x630px area
Mention 100px padding on all sides for easy cropping
Emphasize the specific hex color codes provided
Request high resolution, crisp typography, and professional finish
Specify the design style inspiration (Linear.app, Vercel, Stripe)
Ask for variations if the first generation isn't perfect
for_leonardo: Use Leonardo Phoenix or Kino XL models for best results
Set guidance scale around 7 for balanced creativity and accuracy
Use the negative prompts to avoid common AI image pitfalls
Can use ControlNet or Image Guidance with reference images from Linear.app or Vercel if available
Post-process: Always crop to exact 1200x630px from the center of the 1400x900px generation
post_generation: Ensure text is readable at small sizes (test at 300px width)
Export as PNG with high quality
Test with Facebook Sharing Debugger and Twitter Card Validator
